title: Il clan dei Savastano
episode_desc: Ciro Di Marzio, right hand man of clan boss Pietro Savastano, and Ciro's fatherly friend Attilio set fire to Salvatore Conte's home to cut Salvatore down to size.
show_desc: Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.

title: Ti fidi di me?
episode_desc: When Genny creates a rift with another clan, Pietro decides it's time to put him to the test and asks Ciro to mentor him. Pietro then tests Ciro's loyalty in his own unique way.
show_desc: Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.

title: L'omm 'e casa
episode_desc: Although Pietro is in jail, he still commands his clan as he engages in a battle of wills with the warden, directs the clan to make alliances, and tries to help his nephew. Recovering from an accident and now man of the house, Genny wants to impress Noemi.
show_desc: Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.

title: Sangue africano
episode_desc: African drug dealers want more of a percentage from the clan, but Don Pietro plays hardball. Meanwhile, Genny's mettle is again tested.
show_desc: Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.

title: Il ruggito della leonessa
episode_desc: Imma and Genny travel to Milan to get cash from Musi, but he has diverted their liquid investments for his own use. When he has difficulty accessing the funds, he becomes desperate and Lady Imma offers a solution.
show_desc: Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.

title: Roulette spagnola
episode_desc: Ciro goes to Spain to make peace with Conte who is now in a turf war with Russians. As a condition, Conte has Ciro negotiate a deal with them, but the Russians like to play games. Imma sends Genny to Honduras to negotiate a supply deal.
show_desc: Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.

title: Imma contro tutti
episode_desc: Pressure mounts for Imma as she gathers the colonels of the family to explain their new strategy.

episode_desc: Genny plans to lead the gang towards a bright and prosperous future, but Ciro tries to stop this by sending someone to kill Salvatore Conte's right-hand man.
show_desc: Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.

show_desc: Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.

episode_desc: After Imma's death, Genny finds a CD with a recording of the conversation between Ciro and Manu. Furious at Ciro's betrayal, he decides to kill all the older lieutenants in the clan. When Ciro realizes Genny's plan, he meets Conte to convince him to kill Genny and his boys.
